review_notes.notes:
Andernet Weather is a weather forecast app using Material You design.

TEST ACCOUNT: Not required

KEY FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Weather forecasts (current, hourly, 14-day)
‚Ä¢ Weather radar maps
‚Ä¢ Severe weather alerts (US only)
‚Ä¢ Air Quality Index
‚Ä¢ Home screen widgets
‚Ä¢ Favorite locations

LOCATION PERMISSION:
‚Ä¢ Optional - can use manual search instead
‚Ä¢ Used only for weather forecasts
‚Ä¢ Background access for widget updates (optional)

THIRD-PARTY APIs:
‚Ä¢ Open-Meteo (free weather API)
‚Ä¢ RainViewer (free radar API)
‚Ä¢ National Weather Service (US alerts, free)
‚Ä¢ No tracking or analytics

PRIVACY:
‚Ä¢ No user accounts
‚Ä¢ No tracking/analytics
‚Ä¢ Location not stored on servers
‚Ä¢ All data stored locally

PERMISSIONS:
‚Ä¢ Location - for weather forecasts
‚Ä¢ Internet - to fetch weather data

TEST INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Grant location permission (or skip and search manually)
2. View current weather and forecasts
3. Try radar map (tap map icon)
4. Add widgets from home screen
5. Search for other cities
6. Save favorites
review_notes.special_instructions: The app works fully without location permission by using manual city search. Severe weather alerts only available for US locations.
